title: Bitcoin Runes Launch at the Halving: Here's Everything You Need to Know
description: The creator of Bitcoin’s Ordinals protocol is debuting a new fungible token standard to rival BRC-20. Here’s everything we know about Runes.

title: Bitgert Coin Gains Momentum as the Next Big Thing in Crypto
description: Bitcoin has once again reclaimed the $70,000 level ahead of its upcoming halving event, speculative frenzies are erupting across the entire crypto market. Investors and media outlets are abuzz, gearing up for a potential new era of monumental gains as mass adoption accelerates.

title: Blockchain pioneer Consensys advocates for Ethereum ETFs
description: Consensys, a significant blockchain technology hub, has proposed friendly initiatives to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This firm’s schematic, however, points to the rooted security systems encrypted in the Ethereum blockchain, notably the Proof of Stake (PoS) technique. The SEC receives many comments and requests regarding its application for Ethereum ETF. Consensys champions […]

title: The Koala Coin community expands, attracting Ethereum Classic, Stellar, holders
description: While many cryptocurrencies thrive on hype and volatility, Koala Coin (KLC) meme coin project is carving a different path#partnercontent
